entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as someone who tries to speak but Harry cuts him off. He is not described in detail.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character and is described as cutting across Ron.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is a gamekeeper at Hogwarts and is described in detail. He is playing cards with a stranger when Harry asks him about it.

entities.name: norbert
entities.description: Norbert is a dragon that Hagrid won on the night he was playing cards with the stranger.

relationships.description: Harry asks Hagrid about the stranger he was playing cards with.
Hagrid played cards with a stranger on the night he won Norbert.
